title: Another WolframAlpha typeface
content:
This, and many other samples can be found at

[http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=sr-71](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064403/http:/www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=sr-71 "http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=sr-71")

(in units such as pounds, feet, metres, etc.)

Differences in the lowercase i set this font apart from the one used in the Periodic Table earlier.

Font: 

 Vera Sans 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064403/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

comments.content: Pretty convinced this is the same as on your [other request](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064403/http:/typophile.com/node/107006#comment-566417).
